long_description: The Hugger Mugger Zafu Meditation cushion supports cross-legged, seated and kneeling positions so you can meditate in comfort. Traditional round shape features buckwheat hull filling that conforms to the shape of your body and is extremely resilient. Zippered cover allows you to add or remove filling to customize the cushion.
short_description: The Hugger Mugger Zafu Meditation cushion supports cross-legged, seated and kneeling positions so you can meditate in comfort.
